_header: Hail be thou star of sea / Gods mother blessed you be
Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary

OxfMert248.First Lines:
Ayl be þow ster of segodis moder blessed þow
                    be…
OxfMert248.Last Lines:
…wen he gretthe wyt þe aue mariof synful man yow haue
                    mercy
OxfMert248.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XIV Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1924. 2nd ed., rev.: G. V. Smithers, Oxford,
            1952: 55-6.
